pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package classifies putative polyadenylation sites as true or false/internally oligodT primed // This package implements a Naive Bayes classifier for accurate identification of polyadenylation sites (pA sites) from oligodT based 3 prime end sequencing such as PAS-Seq, PolyA-Seq and RNA-Seq. The classifer is highly accurate and outperforms heuristic methods.
